law.catch_line: Duties of State Citizen Foster Care Review Board.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 398, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 412, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 93, effective July 1, 1987.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). This section was amended by 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 278 and 398 which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
